Subject: Re: [junit] Unit testing Exception classes
X-Yahoo-Group-Post: member; u=12653864; y=5e2Z5BUBXYBg34YglOTCed7xN5VppHRgtCvvP6qXh6Jh0zN8

I absolutely test exception classes and yes, I find bugs. Testing them 
properly does require understanding some lesser known details of Java's 
exception handling mechanism, especially related to how exception 
chaining works. This is often where the bugs lie, and if you aren't 
careful, you can end up testing the wrong behavior.


--
